t: They*p that trust in the Lord*s shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.
As*p the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the Lord*s is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
For*p the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
Do*p good, O Lord,*s unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.
As*p for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the Lord*s shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
